Haloquadratum.label: Haloquadratum
Haloquadratum.description:
Haloquadratum is a genus of the family Halobacteriaceae. The first species to be identified in this group, Haloquadratum walsbyi, is highly unusual since its cells are shaped like flat, square boxes.
First discovered in 1980 by A.E. Wikipedia

Nanoarchaeum equitans.label: Nanoarchaeum equitans
Nanoarchaeum equitans.description: Nanoarchaeum equitans is a species of marine Archaea that was discovered in 2002 in a hydrothermal vent off the coast of Iceland on the Kolbeinsey Ridge by Karl Stetter. Wikipedia

Cenarchaeum.label: Cenarchaeum
Cenarchaeum.description: In taxonomy, Cenarchaeum is a genus of the Cenarchaeaceae. The marine archaean Cenarchaeum symbiosum lives within the sponge Axinella mexicana. Wikipedia

Sulfolobus.label: Sulfolobus
Sulfolobus.description: Sulfolobus is a genus of microorganism in the family Sulfolobaceae. It belongs to the archaea domain. Wikipedia

Korarchaeota.label: Korarchaeota
Korarchaeota.description: In taxonomy, the Korarchaeota are a phylum of the Archaea. The name is derived from the Greek noun koros or kore, meaning ‘‘young man’’ or ‘‘young woman,’’ and the Greek adjective archaios which means ‘‘ancient.’’ Wikipedia

Methanopyrus.label: Methanopyrus
Methanopyrus.description:
In taxonomy, Methanopyrus is a genus of the Methanopyraceae.
Methanopyrus is a genus of methanogen, with a single described species, M. kandleri. Wikipedia

Archaeoglobales.label: Archaeoglobales
Archaeoglobales.description: In taxonomy, the Archaeoglobales are an order of the Archaeoglobi. Wikipedia

Strain 121.label: Strain 121
Strain 121.description: Strain 121 is a single-celled microbe, of the domain Archaea. First discovered 200 miles off Puget Sound in a hydrothermal vent, it is a hyperthermophile, able to survive and reproduce at 121 °C, hence its name. Wikipedia

Halobacterium.label: Halobacterium
Halobacterium.description:
In taxonomy, Halobacterium is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae.
The genus Halobacterium consists of several species of archaea with an aerobic metabolism which require an environment with a high ... Wikipedia

Thermoproteus.label: Thermoproteus
Thermoproteus.description: In taxonomy, Thermoproteus is a genus of the Thermoproteaceae. These prokaryotes are thermophilic sulphur-dependent organisms related to the genera Sulfolobus, Pyrodictium and Desulfurococcus. Wikipedia

Nanoarchaeota.label: Nanoarchaeota
Nanoarchaeota.description: In taxonomy, the Nanoarchaeota are a phylum of the Archaea. This phylum currently has only one representative, Nanoarchaeum equitans. Wikipedia

Halobacteriaceae.label: Halobacteriaceae
Halobacteriaceae.description: In taxonomy, the Halobacteriaceae are a family of the Halobacteriales in the domain Archaea. Wikipedia

Archaeoglobi.label: Archaeoglobi
Archaeoglobi.description: In taxonomy, the Archaeoglobi are a class of the Euryarchaeota. Wikipedia

Halobacterium salinarum.label: Halobacterium salinarum
Halobacterium salinarum.description: Halobacterium salinarum is an extremely halophilic marine Gram-negative obligate aerobic archaeon. Despite its name, this microorganism is not a bacterium, but rather a member of the domain Archaea. Wikipedia

Halobiforma.label: Halobiforma
Halobiforma.description: In taxonomy, Halobiforma is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halobaculum.label: Halobaculum
Halobaculum.description: In taxonomy, Halobaculum is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halorhabdus.label: Halorhabdus
Halorhabdus.description: In taxonomy, Halorhabdus is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halosarcina.label: Halosarcina
Halosarcina.description: In taxonomy, Halosarcina is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Methanofollis.label: Methanofollis
Methanofollis.description: In taxonomy, Methanofollis is a genus of the Methanomicrobiaceae. Wikipedia

Halosimplex.label: Halosimplex
Halosimplex.description: In taxonomy, Halosimplex is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Methanococcus.label: Methanococcus
Methanococcus.description:
In taxonomy, Methanococcus is a genus of the Methanococcaceae.
Methanococcus is a genus of coccoid methanogens. They are all mesophiles, except the thermophilic M. thermolithotrophicus and the hyperthermophilic M. jannaschii. Wikipedia

Methanoplanus.label: Methanoplanus
Methanoplanus.description: In taxonomy, Methanoplanus is a genus of the Methanomicrobiaceae, comprising three species of methanogenic, or methane-producing, archaea. Wikipedia

Methanomicrobiales.label: Methanomicrobiales
Methanomicrobiales.description: In the taxonomy of microorganisms, the Methanomicrobiales are an order of the Methanomicrobia. Methanomicrobiales are strictly carbon dioxide reducing methanogens, using hydrogen or formate as the reducing agent. Wikipedia

Methanoregula.label: Methanoregula
Methanoregula.description: In the taxonomy of microorganisms, Candidatus Methanoregula is a genus of the Methanomicrobiales. Wikipedia

Methanosalsum.label: Methanosalsum
Methanosalsum.description: In taxonomy, Methanosalsum is a genus of the Methanosarcinaceae. Wikipedia

Methanothermobacter.label: Methanothermobacter
Methanothermobacter.description: In taxonomy, Methanothermobacter is a genus of the Methanobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Methanothermococcus.label: Methanothermococcus
Methanothermococcus.description: In taxonomy, Methanothermococcus is a genus of the Methanococcaceae. Wikipedia

Natronomonas.label: Natronomonas
Natronomonas.description: In taxonomy, Natronomonas is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Methanotorris.label: Methanotorris
Methanotorris.description: In taxonomy, Methanotorris is a genus of the Methanocaldococcaceae. Wikipedia

Methanogenium.label: Methanogenium
Methanogenium.description: In taxonomy, Methanogenium is a genus of the Methanomicrobiaceae. Wikipedia

Ferroplasma.label: Ferroplasma
Ferroplasma.description:
In taxonomy, Ferroplasma is a genus of the Ferroplasmaceae.
The genus Ferroplasma consists solely of three species. Its type species, F. acidophilum, is an acidophilic iron-oxidizing member of the Euryarchaeota. Wikipedia

Archaea.label: Archaea
Archaea.description: The Archaea are a domain or kingdom of single-celled microorganisms. These microbes are prokaryotes, meaning they have no cell nucleus or any other membrane-bound organelles in their cells. Wikipedia

Thermococcaceae.label: Thermococcaceae
Thermococcaceae.description: In taxonomy, the Thermococcaceae are a family of the Thermococcales. Wikipedia

Thermococcus gammatolerans.label: Thermococcus gammatolerans
Thermococcus gammatolerans.description: Thermococcus gammatolerans is an archaea extremophile and the most radiation resistant known organism. Wikipedia

Thermoplasma.label: Thermoplasma
Thermoplasma.description:
In taxonomy, Thermoplasma is a genus of the Thermoplasmataceae.
Thermoplasma is a genus of archaea. It belongs to the Thermoplasmata, which thrive in acidic and high-temperature environments. Wikipedia

Picrophilus.label: Picrophilus
Picrophilus.description:
In taxonomy, Picrophilus is an archaean genus of the family Picrophilaceae.
Picrophilus is an extremely acidophilic genus within Euryarchaeota. Wikipedia

Thermoplasmatales.label: Thermoplasmatales
Thermoplasmatales.description: In taxonomy, the Thermoplasmatales are an order of the Thermoplasmata. All are acidophiles, growing optimally at pH below 2. Picrophilus is currently the most acidophilic of all known organisms growing at a minimum pH of 0.06. Wikipedia

Geoglobus.label: Geoglobus
Geoglobus.description: Geoglobus is a hyperthermophilic member of the Archaeoglobaceae within the Euryarchaeota. It consists of one species, G. ahangari, isolated from the Guaymas Basin hydrothermal system located deep within the Gulf of California. Wikipedia

Methanobacteriaceae.label: Methanobacteriaceae
Methanobacteriaceae.description: In taxonomy, the Methanobacteriaceae are a family of the Methanobacteriales. Wikipedia

Methanococcales.label: Methanococcales
Methanococcales.description: In taxonomy, the Methanococcales are an order of the Methanococci. Wikipedia

Methanopyraceae.label: Methanopyraceae
Methanopyraceae.description: In taxonomy, the Methanopyraceae are a family of the Methanopyrales. Wikipedia

Methanospirillaceae.label: Methanospirillaceae
Methanospirillaceae.description: In taxonomy, the Methanospirillaceae are a family of the Methanomicrobiales. Wikipedia

Methanomicrobia.label: Methanomicrobia
Methanomicrobia.description: In the taxonomy of microorganisms, the Methanomicrobia are a class of the Euryarchaeota. Wikipedia

Methanobrevibacter smithii.label: Methanobrevibacter smithii
Methanobrevibacter smithii.description: Methanobrevibacter smithii is the predominant archaeon in the human gut. It plays an important role in the efficient digestion of polysaccharides by consuming the end products of bacterial fermentation. Wikipedia

Ignisphaera.label: Ignisphaera
Ignisphaera.description: In taxonomy, Ignisphaera is a genus of the Desulfurococcales. Wikipedia

Methanoculleus.label: Methanoculleus
Methanoculleus.description: In taxonomy, Methanoculleus is a genus of the Methanomicrobiaceae. Wikipedia

Methanolacinia.label: Methanolacinia
Methanolacinia.description: In taxonomy, Methanolacinia is a genus of the Methanomicrobiaceae. Wikipedia

Acidococcus.label: Acidococcus
Acidococcus.description: In taxonomy, Acidococcus is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. Wikipedia

Caldisphaeraceae.label: Caldisphaeraceae
Caldisphaeraceae.description: In taxonomy, the Caldisphaeraceae are a family of the Acidilobales. Wikipedia

Methanopyrales.label: Methanopyrales
Methanopyrales.description: In taxonomy, the Methanopyrales are an order of the methanopyri. Wikipedia

Thermoprotei.label: Thermoprotei
Thermoprotei.description: The Thermoprotei are a class of the Crenarchaeota. Wikipedia

Methanosarcina.label: Methanosarcina
Methanosarcina.description: Methanosarcina are the only known anaerobic methanogens to produce methane using all three known metabolic pathways for methanogenesis. Most methanogens make methane from carbon dioxide and hydrogen gas. Wikipedia

Natronococcus.label: Natronococcus
Natronococcus.description: In taxonomy, Natronococcus is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Acidianus.label: Acidianus
Acidianus.description: In taxonomy, Acidianus is a genus of the Sulfolobaceae. Wikipedia

Natronorubrum.label: Natronorubrum
Natronorubrum.description: In taxonomy, Natronorubrum is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Pyrolobus fumarii.label: Pyrolobus fumarii
Pyrolobus fumarii.description: Pyrolobus fumarii is a species of archaea known for its ability to survive at extremely high temperatures that kill most organisms. Wikipedia

Sulfurisphaera.label: Sulfurisphaera
Sulfurisphaera.description: In taxonomy, Sulfurisphaera is a genus of the Sulfolobaceae. Wikipedia

Aeropyrum.label: Aeropyrum
Aeropyrum.description: In taxonomy, Aeropyrum is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. Wikipedia

Ignicoccus.label: Ignicoccus
Ignicoccus.description: ignicoccus is a genus of Archaea living in marine hydrothermal vents. They were discovered in Kolbeinsey Ridge north of Iceland and in the Pacific Ocean in 2000. Wikipedia

Nitrosopumilus.label: Nitrosopumilus
Nitrosopumilus.description: Nitrosopumilus maritimus is an extremely common archaeon living in seawater. It is the first member of the Group 1a Crenarchaeota to be isolated in pure culture. Wikipedia

Methanopyri.label: Methanopyri
Methanopyri.description: In taxonomy, the Methanopyri are a class of the Euryarchaeota. Wikipedia

Thermoplasmata.label: Thermoplasmata
Thermoplasmata.description:
In taxonomy, the Thermoplasmata are a class of the Euryarchaeota.
All are acidophiles, growing optimally at pH below 2. Picrophilus is currently the most acidophilic of all known organisms growing at a minimum pH of 0.06. Wikipedia

Metallosphaera.label: Metallosphaera
Metallosphaera.description: In taxonomy, Metallosphaera is a genus of the Sulfolobaceae. Wikipedia

Stetteria.label: Stetteria
Stetteria.description: In taxonomy, Stetteria is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. Wikipedia

Thermocladium.label: Thermocladium
Thermocladium.description: In taxonomy, Thermocladium is a genus of the Thermoproteaceae. Wikipedia

Thermosphaera.label: Thermosphaera
Thermosphaera.description: In taxonomy, Thermosphaera is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. They are a group of prokaryotic organisms which have been discovered in extremely hot environments such as sulfur springs, volcanoes, and magma pools. Wikipedia

Acidilobus.label: Acidilobus
Acidilobus.description: In taxonomy, Acidilobus is a genus of the Acidilobaceae. Wikipedia

Aeropyrum pernix.label: Aeropyrum pernix
Aeropyrum pernix.description: Aeropyrum pernix is an extremophile species of Archaea that is part of the phylum Crenarchaeota. It is a heat-requiring species and was isolated from sediments in the sea off the coast of Japan. Wikipedia

Archaeoglobus.label: Archaeoglobus
Archaeoglobus.description: Archaeoglobus is a genus of the phylum Euryarchaeota. Archaeoglobus can be found in high-temperature oil fields where they may contribute to oil field souring. Wikipedia

Pyrodictiaceae.label: Pyrodictiaceae
Pyrodictiaceae.description: The Pyrodictiaceae are a family of disc-shaped anaerobic microorganisms belonging to the order Desulfurococcales, in the domain Archaea. Wikipedia

Thaumarchaeota.label: Thaumarchaeota
Thaumarchaeota.description: The Thaumarchaeota are a phylum of the Archaea proposed in 2008 after the genome of Cenarchaeum symbiosum was sequenced and found to differ significantly from other members of the hyperthermophilic phylum Crenarchaeota. Wikipedia

Sulfophobococcus.label: Sulfophobococcus
Sulfophobococcus.description: In taxonomy, Sulfophobococcus is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. Wikipedia

Vulcanisaeta.label: Vulcanisaeta
Vulcanisaeta.description: In taxonomy, Vulcanisaeta is a genus of the Thermoproteaceae. Wikipedia

Caldivirga.label: Caldivirga
Caldivirga.description: In taxonomy, Caldivirga is a genus of the Thermoproteaceae. Wikipedia

Caldococcus.label: Caldococcus
Caldococcus.description: In taxonomy, Caldococcus is a genus of the Desulfurococcales. Wikipedia

Thermodiscus.label: Thermodiscus
Thermodiscus.description: In taxonomy, Thermodiscus is a genus of the Desulfurococcaceae. Wikipedia

Haloarcula.label: Haloarcula
Haloarcula.description: In taxonomy, Haloarcula is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halogeometricum.label: Halogeometricum
Halogeometricum.description: In taxonomy, Halogeometricum is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halococcus.label: Halococcus
Halococcus.description: Halococcus is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Haloplanus.label: Haloplanus
Haloplanus.description: In taxonomy, Haloplanus is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halopiger.label: Halopiger
Halopiger.description: In taxonomy, Halopiger is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halomicrobium.label: Halomicrobium
Halomicrobium.description: In taxonomy, Halomicrobium is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halorubrum.label: Halorubrum
Halorubrum.description: In taxonomy, Halorubrum is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Haloterrigena.label: Haloterrigena
Haloterrigena.description: In taxonomy, Haloterrigena is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Halostagnicola.label: Halostagnicola
Halostagnicola.description: In taxonomy, Halostagnicola is a genus of the Archaea. Wikipedia

Halovivax.label: Halovivax
Halovivax.description: In taxonomy, Halovivax is a genus of the Halobacteriaceae. Wikipedia

Methanocalculus.label: Methanocalculus
Methanocalculus.description: In taxonomy, Methanocalculus is a genus of the Methanomicrobiales. Wikipedia

Methanobacteriales.label: Methanobacteriales
Methanobacteriales.description: In taxonomy, the Methanobacteriales are an order of the Methanobacteria. Wikipedia

Methanogenium boonei.label: Methanogenium boonei
Methanogenium boonei.description: Methanogenium boonei is a methanogenic archaean. Cells are non-motile irregular cocci 1.0-2.5 μm in diameter. This mesophile grows optimally at 19.4°C, pH6.4-7.8, salinity 0.3-0.5M Na+. It was first isolated from Skan Bay, Alaska. Wikipedia

Methanohalobium.label: Methanohalobium
Methanohalobium.description: In taxonomy, Methanohalobium is a genus of the Methanosarcinaceae. Its genome has been sequenced. Wikipedia
